info.title: NREL
info.description: The National Renewable Energy Laboratory's developer network helps developers access and use energy data via Web services, including renewable energy and alternative fuel data. NREL is a national laboratory of the U.S. Department of Energy, Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy, operated by the Alliance for Sustainable Energy, LLC.

classification.description: The SWS classification identifier for the specification.
classification.title: Classification

section.description: The section the specification belongs to.
section.title: Section

topic.description: The topic the specification belongs to.
topic.title: Topic

subtopic.description: The subtopic the specification belongs to.
subtopic.title: Subtopic

housing_types.description: An array of housing type strings that apply to this specification.
housing_types.title: Housing Types

get.description: Retrieve standard work specification details for home energy upgrades.

parameters.name: nid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of a standard work specification entry.

parameters.name: spec
parameters.description: The specification ID for a given specification.

parameters.name: ht
parameters.description: The unique identifier of a housing type to filter on.  Single Family Homes: 1, Multi-Family Homes: 2, Manufactured Housing: 3

parameters.name: section
parameters.description: A section identifier. These can be found next to each section in the website navigation and detail pages.

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: A topic identifier. These can be found next to each topic in the website navigation and detail pages.

parameters.name: subtopic
parameters.description: A subtopic identifier. These are the last 2 digits of the Subtopic headers. (Must be entered as a 2 digit number)

version.description: The current version of the web service.
version.title: Version

company_id.description: The identifier of the utility company. If there are multiple utility companies serving the location, the IDs will be returned as a pipe-delimited string.
company_id.title: Company ID

utility_name.description: The name of the utility company. If there are multiple utility companies serving the location, the names will be returned as a pipe-delimited string.
utility_name.title: Utility Name

company_id.description: The identifier of the utility company. If there are multiple utility companies serving the location, the IDs will be returned as a pipe-delimited string.
company_id.title: Company ID

utility_name.description: The name of the utility company. If there are multiple utility companies serving the location, the names will be returned as a pipe-delimited string.
utility_name.title: Utility Name

get.description: This service returns annual average utility rates ($/kWH) for residential, commercial and industrial sectors as well as the local utility name for a specific location. This service does not return complex rate information. The data source is Ventyx Research Inc. and the Energy Information Agency (EIA), and was updated with 2012 numbers.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to use. Required if lat/lon not provided.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude for the location to use. Required if address not given.

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: The longitude for the location to use. Required if address not given.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The radius (in miles) around the search location to search for utility rates with intersecting boundaries.  With the default radius of 0, only utility rates whose boundaries contain the search location point will be returned.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. If no limit is specified then all matching results will be returned.

company_id.description: The identifier of the utility company. If there are multiple utility companies serving the location, the IDs will be returned as a pipe-delimited string.
company_id.title: Company ID

utility_name.description: The name of the utility company. If there are multiple utility companies serving the location, the names will be returned as a pipe-delimited string.
utility_name.title: Utility Name

company_id.description: The identifier of the utility company. If there are multiple utility companies serving the location, the IDs will be returned as a pipe-delimited string.
company_id.title: Company ID

utility_name.description: The name of the utility company. If there are multiple utility companies serving the location, the names will be returned as a pipe-delimited string.
utility_name.title: Utility Name

version.description: The current version of the web service.
version.title: Version

get.summary: Get utility rates by census region
get.description: Given a location and Census Bureau region level (block, blockgroup, tract), return the Census Bureau ID, utility rate and company information.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifying number provided by requester.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to use. Required if lat/lon not provided.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude for the location to use. Required if address not given.

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: The longitude for the location to use. Required if address not given.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: The Census Bureau region level to return.

version.description: The current version of the web service.
version.title: Version

get.description: Returns information about data available for a given location for the solar resource database used by the PVWatts® Calculator and PVWatts v8 API.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to use. Required if lat/lon not provided.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude for the location to use. Required if address not given.

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: The longitude for the location to use. Required if address not given.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The radius (in miles) around the search location to search for utility rates with intersecting boundaries.  With the default radius of 0, only utility rates whose boundaries contain the search location point will be returned.

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: Return all stations within the radius. The closest stations will still be returned individually.

version.description: The current version of the web service.
version.title: Version

get.description: Returns various types of solar data for US locations. The service currently returns data for average Direct Normal Irradiance, average Global Horizontal Irradiance, and average Tilt at Latitude.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to use. Required if lat/lon not provided.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude for the location to use. Required if address not given.

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: The longitude for the location to use. Required if address not given.

groups_with_access_code_fr.description: The groups with access code fr.
groups_with_access_code_fr.title: Groups With Access Code Fr

get.description: Return a full list of alternative fuel stations that match your query.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Return stations that match the given status. A single status, or a comma-separated list of multiple statuses, may be given.

parameters.name: access
parameters.description: Return stations with the given access type.

parameters.name: fuel_type
parameters.description: Return stations that supply any of the given fuel types. A single fuel type, or a comma-separated list of multiple fuel types, may be given.

parameters.name: cards_accepted
parameters.description: Return stations that accept any of the given payment methods. A single payment method, or a comma-separated list of multiple payment methods, may be given.

parameters.name: owner_type
parameters.description: Return stations owned by the given types of owners. A single owner type, or a comma-separated list of multiple owner types, may be given.

parameters.name: federal_agency
parameters.description: Return stations owned by the given federal agency. A federal agency code, or a comma-separated list of multiple federal agency codes, may be given.

parameters.name: cng_fill_type
parameters.description: Return only CNG stations that provide the specified type of dispensing capability. A single type, or a comma separated list of multiple types, may be given.

parameters.name: cng_psa
parameters.description: Return only CNG stations that provide the specified PSI pressure. A single pressure level, or a comma separated list of multiple pressure levels, may be given.

parameters.name: cng_vehicle_class
parameters.description: Return only CNG stations that can accommodate the specified vehicle class size or greater.

parameters.name: e85_has_blender_pump
parameters.description: If true, then return only E85 stations that also have a blender pump capable of providing mid-level ethanol blends.

parameters.name: ev_network
parameters.description: Return only electric charging stations that belong to the given network. A single network, or a comma separated list of multiple networks, may be given.

parameters.name: ev_charging_level
parameters.description: Return only electric charging stations that provide the given level of electric vehicle supply equipment (EVSE).

parameters.name: ev_connector_type
parameters.description: Return only electric charging stations that provide the given connector types.

parameters.name: hy_is_retail
parameters.description: Return only hydrogen stations that match the value. A single retail value, or a comma-separated list of multiple retail values, may be given.

parameters.name: lng_vehicle_class
parameters.description: Return only LNG stations that can accommodate the specified vehicle class size or greater.

parameters.name: lpg_include_secondary
parameters.description: If false, then exclude LPG stations that do not meet the criteria to be considered primary.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Return only stations within the given state. State must be given as a two character state code (eg, "CO" for Colorado). A single state, or a comma-separate list of multiple states, may be given.

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description: Return only stations within the given ZIP code. ZIP codes must be exactly 5 digits long. A single ZIP code, or a comma-separate list of multiple ZIP codes, may be given.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Return only stations within the given country code.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. An explicit limit of up to 200 may be passed in, or the special all string may be passed in to return all results.

groups_with_access_code_fr.description: The groups with access code fr.
groups_with_access_code_fr.title: Groups With Access Code Fr

get.summary: Get an alternative fuel station by ID
get.description: Fetch the details of a specific alternative fuel station given the station's ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the station to find.

groups_with_access_code_fr.description: The groups with access code fr.
groups_with_access_code_fr.title: Groups With Access Code Fr

get.description: Return the nearest alternative fuel stations within a distance of a given location.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: A free-form input describing the address of the location. Required if latitude and longitude not given.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: The latitude for the location to use. Required if address not given.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: The longitude for the location to use. Required if address not given.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The radius (in miles) around the search location to search for stations within.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Return stations that match the given status. A single status, or a comma-separated list of multiple statuses, may be given.

parameters.name: access
parameters.description: Return stations with the given access type.

parameters.name: fuel_type
parameters.description: Return stations that supply any of the given fuel types. A single fuel type, or a comma-separated list of multiple fuel types, may be given.

parameters.name: cards_accepted
parameters.description: Return stations that accept any of the given payment methods. A single payment method, or a comma-separated list of multiple payment methods, may be given.

parameters.name: owner_type
parameters.description: Return stations owned by the given types of owners. A single owner type, or a comma-separated list of multiple owner types, may be given.

parameters.name: federal_agency
parameters.description: Return stations owned by the given federal agency. A federal agency code, or a comma-separated list of multiple federal agency codes, may be given.

parameters.name: cng_fill_type
parameters.description: Return only CNG stations that provide the specified type of dispensing capability. A single type, or a comma separated list of multiple types, may be given.

parameters.name: cng_psa
parameters.description: Return only CNG stations that provide the specified PSI pressure. A single pressure level, or a comma separated list of multiple pressure levels, may be given.

parameters.name: cng_vehicle_class
parameters.description: Return only CNG stations that can accommodate the specified vehicle class size or greater.

parameters.name: e85_has_blender_pump
parameters.description: If true, then return only E85 stations that also have a blender pump capable of providing mid-level ethanol blends.

parameters.name: ev_network
parameters.description: Return only electric charging stations that belong to the given network. A single network, or a comma separated list of multiple networks, may be given.

parameters.name: ev_charging_level
parameters.description: Return only electric charging stations that provide the given level of electric vehicle supply equipment (EVSE).

parameters.name: ev_connector_type
parameters.description: Return only electric charging stations that provide the given connector types.

parameters.name: hy_is_retail
parameters.description: Return only hydrogen stations that match the value. A single retail value, or a comma-separated list of multiple retail values, may be given.

parameters.name: lng_vehicle_class
parameters.description: Return only LNG stations that can accommodate the specified vehicle class size or greater.

parameters.name: lpg_include_secondary
parameters.description: If false, then exclude LPG stations that do not meet the criteria to be considered primary.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Return only stations within the given state. State must be given as a two character state code (eg, "CO" for Colorado). A single state, or a comma-separate list of multiple states, may be given.

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description: Return only stations within the given ZIP code. ZIP codes must be exactly 5 digits long. A single ZIP code, or a comma-separate list of multiple ZIP codes, may be given.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Return only stations within the given country code.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. An explicit limit of up to 200 may be passed in, or the special all string may be passed in to return all results.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset the results found (can be used with the limit parameter to paginate the results).
